parameters.definition: Minimum number of people to transport
Minimum percentage of vehicles that must be limousines

description: A party organizer needs to transport party goers either by limousine or bus. Limousines can carry \param{LimousineCapacity} people and buses can carry \param{BusCapacity} people. They need to transport at least \param{MinimumPeople} people. Because limousines are more attractive, at least \param{MinimumLimousinePercentage} of the vehicles must be limousines. How many of each type of vehicle should be used to minimize the total number of limousines and buses used?
